comment.author: 59410977@N08
comment._content: Uganda has never had such posh prisons, maybe the pictures was taken at some Tororo Palace, the livingroom setting in the pictures appears to be of a to do family of that time.

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content:
To clarify, our catalogue describes images from this piece (CO 1069/192) as "Exhibition of prison industries and handicrafts". The prison names that appear in these images are presumably the names of the prisons which produced the objects on display.

This drinks cabinet was apparently a product of Tororo Prison
